mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_order_deal
id,
order_no,
body,
detail,
number,
price,
total_fee,
spbill_create_ip,
pay_start_time,
pay_end_time,
goods_tag,
openid,
pay_time,
pay_status,
maniche_id,
area_id,
university_id,
create_time,
create_user,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{body,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update tbl_order_deal
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
body = #{body,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
total_fee = #{totalFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
spbill_create_ip = #{spbillCreateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
pay_start_time = #{payStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
pay_end_time = #{payEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
goods_tag = #{goodsTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
maniche_id = #{manicheId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
university_id = #{universityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
where 1=1 and id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(1) as TOTALCOUNT from (
select
from tbl_order_deal where 1=1
and id like CONCAT(#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and order_no like CONCAT(#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and body like CONCAT(#{body,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and detail like CONCAT(#{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and number like CONCAT(#{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and price like CONCAT(#{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and total_fee like CONCAT(#{totalFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and spbill_create_ip like CONCAT(#{spbillCreateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and pay_start_time like CONCAT(#{payStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and pay_end_time like CONCAT(#{payEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and goods_tag like CONCAT(#{goodsTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and openid like CONCAT(#{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and pay_time like CONCAT(#{payTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and pay_status like CONCAT(#{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and maniche_id like CONCAT(#{manicheId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and area_id like CONCAT(#{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and university_id like CONCAT(#{universityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT(#{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT(#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
limit #{limitStart,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{limitSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
) as TMP_COUNT_TABLE

select
from tbl_order_deal where 1=1 and id = #{0}
